data.actual_result: Instead, the tab stays really small.
data.expected_result: The tabs should go back to normal size.
data.short_description: Friends category tabs don’t get back to size after iOS 11.0 multitasking.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord, and go to the tab that shows your friends. - Drag a random app to multitask with Discord app. - Drag the another app to maximum size without closing Discord. - After that, drag the random app off the screen. - And observe the friends tabs (All, Online, Pending etc.)
